content: thistle beanie used one ball of softie to make one cosy beanie that fits most adults the colours in the beanie are reminiscent of a scottish thistle - using colour way 700 however - you never can predict these things - the pattern became popular among crocheters using a chunky yarn and so a variation in the pattern was added in may 2019 written in us terms with uk terns included in abbreviations this pattern has been tested however if you notice an error please contact me with any feedback no restrictions are placed on finished items made with this pattern however the pattern may not be resold or copied in any form pictures remain the property of emma wilkinson designs
